recommended_degree: Statistik, Matematika, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Industri, Ekonomi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Assist in monitoring digital campaign performance across platforms (Google Ads, Meta, LinkedIn, etc.) and help analyze data to identify key trends and insights.
- Support the team in optimizing budget allocation and bidding strategies to improve ROI.
- Help design, execute, and evaluate A/B testing for digital ads and landing pages.
- Prepare and maintain regular performance reports and dashboards for internal review.
- Conduct basic keyword, audience, and competitor research to support marketing strategy development.
- Collaborate with content, design, and development teams to ensure alignment between campaigns and business goals.
- Assist in scheduling meetings, taking meeting notes, summarizing key points, and handling client communications under supervision.
- Learn to use and apply tools such as Google Analytics, Google Optimize, and other digital marketing platforms to track and measure campaign performance.
